mapper.select: select a.*, IFNULL(interact.channel,'002001') as code from (select * from inno72_merchant_total_count where merchant_id is not null and merchant_id != '' order by last_update_time desc limit 100000) a left join inno72_interact interact on interact.id = a.activity_id where merchant_id = #{merchantId} group by merchant_id, activity_id order by id desc
select activity_type from inno72.inno72_merchant_total_count where activity_id = #{activityId} limit 1
select count(0) from inno72.inno72_interact where id = #{activityId}
select channel from inno72.inno72_interact where id = #{activityId}

select MIN(start_time) AS start_time, MAX(end_time) AS end_time from (SELECT MIN(imt.start_time) AS start_time, MAX(imt.end_time) AS end_time, im.interact_id as id FROM inno72_interact_machine im JOIN `inno72_interact_machine_goods` img ON im.id = img.interact_machine_id JOIN inno72_goods ig ON img.goods_id = ig.id LEFT JOIN `inno72_interact_machine_time` imt ON im.id = imt.interact_machine_id WHERE im.interact_id = #{activityId} AND ig.seller_id IN (SELECT id FROM inno72_merchant WHERE merchant_account_id = ( SELECT id FROM inno72_merchant_user WHERE merchant_id = #{merchantId} )) GROUP BY im.interact_id
union all
SELECT i.start_time, i.end_time, i.id FROM (SELECT MIN( imt.start_time ) AS start_time, MAX( imt.end_time ) AS end_time ,i.`name`,i.id FROM inno72_interact_machine im LEFT JOIN `inno72_interact_machine_time` imt ON im.id = imt.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact i ON i.id=im.interact_id GROUP BY im.interact_id ) i LEFT JOIN `inno72_interact_goods` ig LEFT JOIN inno72_coupon c ON ig.goods_id = c.id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = c.shops_id ON ig.interact_id = i.id WHERE ig.type =1 AND i.id = #{activityId} and s.seller_id in (SELECT id FROM inno72_merchant WHERE merchant_account_id = ( SELECT id FROM inno72_merchant_user WHERE merchant_id = #{merchantId} )) GROUP BY i.id ) t group by id

SELECT count(distinct im.machine_id) as num, area.city as address FROM inno72_interact_machine im JOIN `inno72_interact_machine_goods` img ON im.id = img.interact_machine_id JOIN inno72_goods ig ON img.goods_id = ig.id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine machine on machine.id = im.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale ilocal on ilocal.id = machine.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area on area.`code` = ilocal.area_code LEFT JOIN `inno72_interact_machine_time` imt ON im.id = imt.interact_machine_id WHERE im.interact_id = #{activityId} AND ig.seller_id IN (SELECT id FROM inno72_merchant WHERE merchant_account_id = ( SELECT id FROM inno72_merchant_user WHERE merchant_id = #{merchantId} ) ) group by area.`city`
select * from inno72_merchant_total_count where activity_id = #{activityId} and merchant_id = #{merchantId}
